issue.title: [R] DuckDB test is failing (again) with new duckdb release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17809](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17809). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It looks like the fix that I thought would work in DuckDB did not, in fact fix the error! The previous ticket, ARROW-17643, just skipped the test until the new release of duckdb (which just happened).
